summary:
### **Dividend Notification Summary (ASX: TCL - Transurban Group)**  

- **Dividend Amount:** AUD 0.33 per stapled security  
- **Ex-Date:** 27 June 2025  
- **Record Date:** 30 June 2025  
- **Payment Date:** 22 August 2025  
- **DRP Election Deadline:** 1 July 2025 (17:00 AEST)  
- **DRP Discount:** None (0% discount)  
- **Franked Portion:** 0.0518% (AUD 0.000171 per security)  
- **DRP Price Method:** VWAP over 10 trading days (4–17 July 2025)  
- **Key Tax Detail:** Partial franking (30% tax rate); refer to [Transurban’s tax portal](https://www.transurban.com/investor-centre/distributions-and-tax/trust-distributions) for breakdown.  

**Note:** Default option for non-responsive shareholders is cash (no DRP participation).
